Title: Work Arrangements
Text:
The Boss is going to go hunting near the outskirts of Loong's Gaze to get some Raw Meat to stock up on.
Those chosen to accompany the trip report themselves and cross their names off (a three-day ration penalty for those who don't show up).
List: Mashan, Zhiyan, Shekishui.
The others make their own arrangements.

Attention.
No clashing with Huanglong officials, no clashing with other gangs, unless you can beat them all up.
Remember, weigh your own abilities before making a move.
